text: Sophie Irene Hunter (born 16 March 1978) is an English avant-garde theatre and opera director, playwright, and former performer. Her career began in 2007 when she co-directed the experimental play The Terrific Electric. She has directed an Off-Off-Broadway revival of Henrik Ibsen's Ghosts (2010). In 2015, Hunter married actor Benedict Cumberbatch. They have three sons. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:English theatre directors Category:English playwrights Category:English stage actors
title: Sophie Hunter
